notes: Speak to Futaba in front of Cafe Leblanc and complete 'The Money-Grubbing Uncle' Mementos Request that will automatically start.

notes: 'Daughter's Just a Meal Ticket' Mementos Mission automatically obtained.

Choose to spend today how you like, if you are behind on either the Hermit or Tower confidants and you're missing Mementos missions, use this time to catch up with those.
(Optional) Buy SP recovery items from the vending machines near the Bathhouse, medicine, or equipment.
(Optional) We recommend getting Celestial and Money Readings from Chihaya to increase the chance of Fusion Alarms and money earned.
Travel to the Akihabara Game Center and win a Lexy Doll from the machine on the left.
If you are short on money, you can save beforehand and then reload your save if you find yourself spending too much money trying to win the doll.
Infiltrate Mementos and complete all requests.
Call Kawakami from Leblanc and ask for a massage.

Secure the route in Niijima's palace as far as you can go. You'll realise that you need Niijima to recognize you in court in the real world.
You can read our full palace walkthrough here, as well as our guide on where to find all Will Seeds.
Call Kawakami from Leblanc and ask for a massage.
On the train: read a book of your choice. We recommend something that opens up locations or additional benefits.
